title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe a structural barrier in the scenario that makes it less likely that a third-party candidate will be able to secure enough popular support to justify including the candidate in a debate. The response must include a reference to the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how a third-party candidate could still have an influence on public policy despite the barrier described in part A. The response must be in the context of the scenario.

For Task C, the response must explain how including the third-party candidate in the scenario could have a positive impact on participatory democracy.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the prompt.
